text: Kazhutʹ, "O poslidovnyky svyatoho pysannya, dozvolenoho nam prybuvayutʹ do lohichnoho dohovoru mizh namy ta vamy: shcho my ne budemo obozhnyuvaty krim BOHA; shcho my nikoly ne vstanovlyuyemo budʹ-yakykh idoliv krim Yoho, ne vstanovlyuyemo budʹ- yakykh lyudsʹkykh istot tomu shcho lordy bilya BOHA." Yakshcho vony prohanyayutʹ, kazhutʹ, "Dayutʹ svidchennya shcho my submitters
